citations.narrative:
The vinyl coated chain link wire in the upper level at the deck in the area where the tunnel connects has been unraveled
and some of the wire has been pulled out from the staples. These wires are pointed and can lead to injury such as
puncture wounds. All wire points shall be secured or removed to protect the primates from injury.
Correct by February 17, 2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.80(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The vinyl coated chain link wire in the upper level at the deck in the area where the tunnel connects has been unraveled 
and some of the wire has been pulled out from the staples.  These wires are pointed and can lead to injury such as 
puncture wounds.  All wire points shall be secured or removed to protect the primates from injury. 
Correct by February 17, 2022. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
